description:
Sets your desktop wallpaper to the Bing image of the day.
    
The [original FreshBing script](https://github.com/ndabas/FreshBing) was written by Nikhil Dabas. David enhanced the script to add an image description overlay.

The Chocolatey package creates a Windows scheduled task to run the script daily at 9am and also when a user first logs in.
displayName: Bing Image Of The Day Desktop Wallpaper (FreshBing)
summary: Sets your desktop wallpaper to the Bing iamge of the day
author: Nikhil Dabas,  David Gardiner
